name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of March 8, during the military training at the Shenzhen campus of Harbin Institute of Technology, more than 4,000 students were physically punished for more than half an hour, which directly led to two students being taken away by ambulance due to sudden illness.
The students said that they were first punished to stand for more than ten minutes that night, and then they were punished to squat for more than ten minutes, and then they were asked to yell at the top of their lungs when they were called out one by one. They did not stop until the two students were sent to the ambulance. During the period, the chief instructor Zhang Mouming also asked everyone to wait for him, and he wanted to shoot a video.
This move aroused the anger of many students. The students said that Zhang Mouming, the chief instructor of military training, had filmed military training content many times and posted it on Douyin to gain traffic. He also ran an MCN company. They questioned that the corporal punishment and tossing tonight were just to toss students to shoot Douyin materials for their accounts.

content:
"A country within a country"
A Hebei netizen submitted an article saying that all the roads from Hebei to Beijing are currently blocked. If you want to enter Beijing from Hebei, you need to go to a designated procuratorate to scan your ID card to enter.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Official Tutorial on Climbing the Wall"
On March 9, the official Douyin account of the Zhengzhou Joint Logistics Support Center of the Chinese People's Liberation Army released a short video popularizing the idea that "climbing the wall is illegal". Because the video detailed the steps on how to climb the wall and what software should be downloaded, many netizens complained: Is this a legal education or a tutorial?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @nursenika1840 Soldiers have been allowed to play with their phones for many years. If you search now, you will find that troops in various places have their own King of Glory and Chicken Mobile Game competitions.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 8, a traffic accident occurred near Renshou Road on Jiefang Avenue in Wuhan, Hubei. According to online reports, the driver was suspected to be driving under the influence and ran out of the lane, hitting a white car that was traveling normally in the opposite lane, resulting in the death of a female passenger in the white car.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: An e-commerce practitioner submitted a post saying that due to the new regulations that came into effect on March 1, which prohibited express delivery from leaving the post station without permission, a large number of couriers in Xiangyang resigned, and a large number of express deliveries are currently in backlog. According to public news reports, the post station is currently unable to recruit couriers, and the bosses are delivering the goods themselves.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"War Horse in Action"
March 8, Shenzhen, Guangdong. A convenience store owner encountered "patriotic fraud".
A man provocatively accused the convenience store owner of "selling Japanese products and being unpatriotic" by having Nongfu Spring in his store. He then took out his phone and started filming a video.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: However, I personally think that the fact that the accident report did not mention that the victim was a child was simply because the authorities wanted to deliberately reduce public opinion and avoid the incident from escalating. This is the second incident of a car hitting a child in a short period of time.

content: March 9, Jiaxing, Zhejiang. A road collapsed near Nanhai Fishing Village on Chengnan Road.

content:
Just now, on the evening of March 9, MixC, Hangzhou.
A man broke into a gold shop and robbed it with a hammer.
After being arrested, he shouted "I have diplomatic immunity" and "I am not Chinese."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the afternoon of March 9, in Linyi, Shandong, a traffic police officer was checking an online ride-hailing car when a white car suddenly ran over the police officer and fled.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of March 9, near the Olympic Sports Center in Zhengzhou, Henan Province, a group of electric motorcycles provoked traffic police on the street.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It is reported that because the traffic police strictly checked the gathering of motorcycles and ignored electric motorcycles, the motorcycle owners hid on the hillside and dared not show their heads, while the electric motorcycle owners were swaggering in front of the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Correction, early morning of March 9

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On March 6, during the live broadcast of the economic press conference of the two sessions, a woman in gray in the first row suddenly rushed to the rostrum and was stopped, and then the screen was switched. 
The clip has been deleted in the current playback video.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to public information, the meeting was attended by Zheng Zhajie, Director of the National Development and Reform Commission, Lan Fuan, Minister of Finance, Wang Wentao, Minister of Commerce, Pan Gongsheng, Governor of the People's Bank of China, and Wu Qing, Chairman of the China Securities Regulatory Commission, who answered questions from Chinese and foreign journalists on development and reform, fiscal budget, commerce, finance and securities.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: March 8, Jilin. The demolition of the Songyuan Refinery in Jilin caused severe vibrations in nearby residential buildings. Local residents were worried that the demolition would affect the safety of their homes, and they went to the local government departments to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 8, Qinghe County, Hebei Province, Haoyi Food Factory dismissed employees without reason, and the employees gathered at the company to defend their rights.
